resources.string: This InstantSend payment has not been transmitted yet.
This InstantSend payment is awaiting verification by the Dash Network.
This InstantSend payment is awaiting verification by the Dash Network.
This InstantSend payment has been verified by the Dash Network.
This is your recovery phrase. Please write it down.
DO NOT let anyone see your recovery phrase or they can spend your Dash. This phrase is not compatible with other Dash Software.
Your wallet is protected by a spending PIN. Enter your PIN and press Show to view your recovery phrase.
Collect information about your issue and email your report to the developers.
No fee of will be paid. Use \'no fee\' only if you don\'t care about confirmation time.
Application %s would like to receive your Master Public Key. This can be used to keep track of your wallet, this can not be used to move your Dash.
Application %s is requesting an address so it can pay you. Would you like to authorize this?
